resources.string:
Welcome to Travel Spot! With this app, you can add notes to locations on a map. 

To get started, simply long-press on the map to drop a pin at your desired location. Once you've added a location, you can edit its notes by clicking on the pin representing it on the map. 

In the home page, you can swipe left or right on a spot to edit its note or delete it. Additionally, you can mark a spot as "finished" by checking the box next to it. 

Note that if a spot is marked as finished, the app will not send notifications for it.
